name: auto_eq
description: Analyze audio frequency spectrum and suggest corrective EQ settings. Returns a list of frequency bands with suggested gain adjustments to achieve a balanced mix. Does NOT modify audio â€” returns suggestions for the AI to apply via plugin parameters.

target_curve.description: Target frequency response: 'flat' (neutral), 'warm' (boosted lows, rolled highs), 'bright' (boosted highs), 'vocal' (presence boost). Default: 'flat'.

max_boost_db.description: Maximum EQ boost in dB (default: 6). Limits how aggressive corrections are.
